title: Time to play "What's that font"!
content:
I need help, again, in identifying a font.  
This site was so helpful before that I'm back to ask for help.

[http://i.imgur.com/rVhVgyB.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20130820011026/http:/i.imgur.com/rVhVgyB.gif "http://i.imgur.com/rVhVgyB.gif")  
It's an animated banner.
author: craftylsoer

comments.content:
Could find a way of posting a non animated specimen?  
Don
